text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا قَنَطُواْ وَيَنشُرُ رَحۡمَتَهُۥۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

translation.en: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy. And He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy
translation.id: Dan Dialah yang menurunkan hujan setelah mereka berputus asa dan menyebarkan rahmat-Nya. Dan Dialah Maha Pelindung, Maha Terpuji
